page.title: 14BEAUMONT SHOPPING COMPLEX
page.content: The Beaumont Shopping Centre also has co-ordinated many events and activities since its opening including (i) May 84; air display (ii) June 84; beauty queen competition (iii)July 84; horse-drawn carriage display (iv) Sept 84; veteran car festival (v) Oct 84; 3D photo competition (vi) Nov 84; firework display (vii) Dec 84; Santa's grotto and castle Each month a major event raises money for charity and makes shopping a very different experience. Additionally, local groups stage plays or other street entertainment. Many schools take part in such events.
